abstract: Spanish building giant Sacyr Vallehermoso has inked a deal to sell highway operator Itinere Infraestructuras to a Citigroup fund for 7.9 billion euros ($10 billion).
lead_paragraph: Spanish building giant Sacyr Vallehermoso has inked a deal to sell highway operator Itinere Infraestructuras to a Citigroup fund for 7.9 billion euros ($10 billion).

headline.main: Citi Buys Sacyr Unit for $10 Billion
